Text: Greatest movie ever made. Thanks for the up.
It's a great movie, but the IMDb Top 250 is not a list of the greatest movies. This is not the greatest movie ever made. It is the most popular.
The fact that IMDB has it #1, and I have it #1 are purely coincidental. I wasn't referring to the IMDB rating.
Well I'm glad you like it :)
its one of those movies which isnt "action-packed", but still remains with u for a long time...
Contrary to the above comment, there is, of course, sound. And top quality sound at that.
what is the most preferable media player to play it on? thanks
Remember to get a player/plugin compatible with mkv files if the audio is gone. Type ".mkv" or "Matroska" in Google.
How do I get the Slovokian subtitles off? Thanks.
Amazing video, when not glitching. Spotty up, imo.
you'd think after downloading 6 1/2 gigs somebody would take 15 seconds to post A/V

A must have for fans of the movie. Compression is good, although a bit grain related artifacts for 6.5GB 720p in a few dark backgrounds.  Upped 1.3x and counting. Many thanks.
V=9.5 A=10 M=10
P.D.: Video quality is very good, i was just splitting hairs..
